alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Heard; South Fulton; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 11:02PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Fayette, southeastern Carroll, Heard, northern Troup, Coweta, southwestern Fulton and northwestern Clayton Counties through 1130 PM EST... At 1101 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Palmetto to Texas, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, LaGrange, Fayetteville, Franklin, Peachtree City, Union City, Forest Park, Riverdale, Fairburn, Tyrone, Morrow, Palmetto, Hogansville, Grantville, Whitesburg, Centralhatchee, Moreland, Sharpsburg, East Newnan and Corinth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Heard; South Fulton; Troup
